industry: Non-profit Organizations and Primary and Secondary Education
description:
We Are: NEON is an independent film distribution and production company that champions bold cinema, taking creative risks and pushing boundaries. Our passion lies in auteur-driven content and amplifying diverse voices. From Oscar-nominated documentaries to Palme d'Or winners at Cannes, NEON continues to push the boundaries of storytelling in cinema. The Role: We are looking for a Company Coordinator to join our team! As the Company Coordinator, you will be responsible for providing day-to-day administrative support to our Founder/CEO and working closely with various departments to ensure the smooth and efficient operation of the company. This position reports directly to the Founder/CEO and is based in our Los Angeles office. Here's What You Will Do:
  • Executive Support:
    • Provide comprehensive administrative support to the CEO/Founder, including managing calendars, and scheduling meetings
    • Conduct research and prepare presentations as needed
    • Coordinate travel arrangements and itineraries
    • Manage confidential information with discretion
    • Serve as a central point of contact for internal and external communications, ensuring timely and effective information flow
  • Interdepartmental Coordination:
    • Serve as a liaison between the CEO/Founder and various departments (development, theatrical, finance, marketing, etc.)
    • Facilitate communication and collaboration among team members
    • Coordinate cross-departmental projects and initiatives as assigned by the CEO/Founder
  • Development Support:
    • Assist the acquisitions & development team by providing script and screener coverage, as well as film festival coordination
    • Conduct research on potential projects and talent
    • Prepare development materials and presentations

Compensation: California State Annual Pay Transparency Range: $67,000 - $70,000. For full-time positions, this pay range is for base per year; however, base pay offered may vary depending on factors such as location, candidate's job-related knowledge, education, skills, and experience, the level of specialization needed for the role, budget constraints, and local market conditions. The NEON Hybrid Work Model: Our hybrid work model is beautifully straightforward: We spend three days a week working from the office. These intentional in-person days in curated workspaces allow us to fully embrace the benefits of collaboration. The remaining days of the week are yours to decide where to work, allowing for a seamless blend of work and personal life. We would love to hear from you if you are an organized and detail-oriented individual with a passion for independent cinema. Join our team and contribute to NEON's success as we continue to redefine the film industry. Requirements What We're Looking For:
  • Experience: Minimum of 2 years of experience in an administrative or coordination role, preferably in the entertainment industry
  • Organization Skills: Strong organization skills and ability to multitask and prioritize in a fast-paced environment
  • Attention to Detail: Excellent attention to detail and accuracy in all work
  • Communication: Strong written and verbal communication skills
  • Problem-Solving: Proactive problem-solving skills and ability to adapt to changing priorities
  • Team Player: Ability to work effectively in a team environment and collaborate with colleagues across different departments


Benefits
  • Get peace of mind with our Comprehensive Health Care Plan, covering medical, dental, and vision expenses
  • Secure your future with our Retirement Savings Plan, offering options like 401k and IRA
  • Stay protected with our Life Insurance Coverage, including both Basic and Voluntary plans, as well as AD&D
  • Enjoy a healthy work-life balance with our Generous Paid Time Off policy, which encompasses vacation, sick days, and public holidays
  • Take care of your loved ones with our Family Leave Options, including Parental and Caregiver Leaves
  • Flexible Work Arrangements
  • Invest in your wellbeing through our Wellness Programs and Resources
